Title: AppToolkit
Description: WPF Converters, MVVM base classes and common dialogs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF Converters, MVVM base classes and common dialogs.

In the project I try to manage common functionality that I reuse across several projects. This includes some MVVM base classes, services and control/dialogs.
The toolkit bases on .NET 4 and contains WPF specific parts.

Feel free to have a peek.

Mario
